ðŸ“– Summary: Transcriber is an open-source, self-hosted web application that leverages AI (Whisper) to transcribe audio and video files or YouTube URLs. It prioritizes privacy and speed, offering GPU acceleration and a user-friendly interface with features like transcript history and temporary media cleanup.
